hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Perform Hajj and 'Umrah consecutively, for they remove poverty and sin as the bellows removes impurity from iron and gold and silver, and Hajj Al-Mabrur brings no less a reward than Paradise

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الْمُتَابَعَةِ بَيْنَ الْحَجِّ وَالْعُمْرَةِ
chapter.eng-name: the virtue or Performing Hajj and 'Umrah Consecutively
